metadata.dc:description: A clinical case of Wilms' tumor with primary metastasis to right thigh without pulmonary metastasis that would explain the dissemination to soft tissues is presented. Considerations on the mechanism of metastasis dissemination are made in regard to the question in this particular location. We have not found a similar case in medical literature.
metadata.dc:title: Nefroblastoma con met치stasis primaria a muslo derecho.
[Nephroblastoma with primary metastasis to the right thigh].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
